description.en:
Our system generates NFT Tokens based on Binance Smart Chain. LIMON NFT Tokens are interconnected to digital products and commercial physical products (EAN - European Article Number). Our upcoming DEX exchange (P2P) owns an automatic market maker (AMM) for exchanging BEP-20 tokens. Liquidity pools and locks, farming and staking functionalities will be included.

Our LIMON GROUP exchange can also be used as a payment gateway in online shops and applications. Next to the mobile exchange version a version for iOS and Android is already planned.
